LanguageData.VFESecurity.TargetWorldTile_Description: Select a world tile for this {0} to fire at.
LanguageData.VFESecurity.TargetWorldTile_DescriptionS: Select a world tile to fire at.
LanguageData.VFESecurity.CommandTargetTileFailNoArtil: This {0} does not have any suitable artillery.
LanguageData.VFESecurity.MessageTargetWorldTileOutOfR: Targeted area is out of the {0}'s range.
LanguageData.VFESecurity.Message_ArtilleryBombardment: {0} from {1} have stopped bombarding your settlements.
LanguageData.VFESecurity.ArtilleryStrikePeaceTalks_Le: By sending an artillery strike at their peace talks negotiation party, relations between you and {0} have soured. They may send a raiding party in retaliation.
LanguageData.VFESecurity.ArtilleryStrikeSettlement_Le: Due to your provocation via artillery strike, the {0} at {1} have decided to return fire at your settlements using their own artillery!\n\nThis bombardment will go on for a few days, or until you destroy the settlement.
LanguageData.VFESecurity.LetterFactionBaseDefeatedStr: The enemy base {0} has been destroyed.
LanguageData.VFESecurity.DesignatorRearmTraps_Descrip: Mark unarmed rearmable traps to be rearmed by your colonists.
